Description_lang: Finishing move that infects the target with shadowy energy, dealing Shadow damage over time and causing attacks against the target to reduce movement speed by $206760s1% for $206760d. Lasts longer per combo point.   1 point  : ${$<bonus>*$m1*8/2} over 8 sec   2 points: ${$<bonus>*$m1*10/2} over 10 sec   3 points: ${$<bonus>*$m1*12/2} over 12 sec   4 points: ${$<bonus>*$m1*14/2} over 14 sec   5 points: ${$<bonus>*$m1*16/2} over 16 sec$?s193531[   6 points: ${$<bonus>*$m1*18/2} over 18 sec][]
AuraDescription_lang: Suffering $w1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec and snared by attacks.
